item.title: 2025-Feb-23
item.description:
Trying to implement something similar to DayOne. Essentially a place where I can dive in and jot quick notes for that day - not having to worry about frontmatter, templates etc.

I might have to do some minor tweaks on how images are displayed here similar to the photos page…

M went over to the Jewish neighborhood in Centro Historico for the Post Language Program trip. S & I stayed back. Got some paperwork done for our visas. Walked over to El Jardín Escénico on Reforma and from there head over to Ehden Restaurant to meet the PLP group there. Some decent Lebanese food, a delicious date cake and a TERRIFIC arabic coffee!
